author: sky.cactus
content: What link did you find this bug bounty program at?

author: sky.cactus
content: I would also be very suspicious of anyone asking for KYC docs to submit a bug report.

author: sky.cactus
content: Though, I do have a vague memory of being angry at EF for doing unnecessary KYC on something before, maybe it was the bug bounty program.

author: cryptowiz0488
content:
The KYC is for payment, they already accepted the report. The bug submission is through https://ethereum.org/bug-bounty/ that lead to this form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd28dv9jU4lqC2GK_Vbv2ev5dJ0Tp4K3CF_mSZZB6Ljyb7_QQ/viewform.  

The report I submitted is actually reflected in changes recently made to Geth. I just want to make sure the people reaching out are legit, because the first email I got from "legal" about KYC was from a kissflow email address. Which seemed odd.
